summary: The bill, titled "Protecting Regular Order for Veterans Act of 2025," aims to improve oversight of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) budget and limit certain incentive payments. It mandates quarterly briefings to Congress on the VA budget and any shortfalls, requiring the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to present mitigation plans. The bill also restricts critical skill incentives for Senior Executive Service employees at the VA's Central Office and outlines reporting requirements on such incentives.
